english.segment1: I've been standing on the edge. Waiting for a sign. Ready for the world to stop its turning. I've been looking everywhere. And it seems all that I find. Is evidence of Your, Your great returning
english.segment2: And my mind starts wondering far away. To when I'll be in a better place
english.segment3: (chorus). 'Cause I am ready for a world. Where my eyes will finally see. Where my heart has longed to be, Jesus. I am ready for a world. When I will kneel before Your throne. And I will hear the words "you are finally home". I am ready for that world. But for now and until then. I will try and comprehend. How my world will be made new. I'm ready, I'm ready
english.segment4: I've been staring at the sky. Looking past the clouds. Wondering if You are just beyond them. I can almost see it now. How everything will change. When You start coming down in a cloud of glory
english.segment5: And my mind starts wondering far away. To be where I'll be in a better place
